Uses of Interface
squidpony.squidgrid.gui.swing.animation.Animation

  • Packages that use Animation 
    Package Description
    squidpony.squidgrid.gui.swing.animation  

    • Uses of Animation in squidpony.squidgrid.gui.swing.animation

      Classes in squidpony.squidgrid.gui.swing.animation that implement Animation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BumpAnimation
      Animates an object moving smoothly in a direction and then bouncing back.
      class  SlideAnimation
      This class animates an image sliding directly from one point to another.
      class  WiggleAnimation
      This class animates an object by causing it to wiggle semi-randomly without straying too far from it's original point.
      Methods in squidpony.squidgrid.gui.swing.animation with parameters of type Animation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AnimationManager.add(Animation animation)
      Adds the animation and starts it immediately, with the given speed parameter indicating how many milliseconds to wait between animation steps.
      void AnimationManager.stopAnimation(Animation animation)
      Stops the given animation if it is in the current list of running animations.
